title: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the key is left blank, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: Attempting to add externalized text with a blank key results in an error, and the text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The system should allow the addition of externalized text even if the key is blank. In such cases, the chart should display the externalized text without any issues.
SR:
1. Attempt to add externalized text in the chart title with a blank key.
2. Verify that the externalized text is successfully displayed in the chart without any errors.
